statements: SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE currency = 'USD' ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, currency FROM user_accounts WHERE balance >= 1000;
SELECT user_id, balance, currency FROM user_accounts WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE currency = 'EUR' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT user_id, balance, currency, created_at FROM user_accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE currency = 'USD';
SELECT user_id, MAX(balance) AS max_balance FROM user_accounts GROUP BY user_id HAVING max_balance > 5000;
SELECT AVG(balance) AS avg_balance, COUNT(*) AS num_accounts FROM user_accounts;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE currency IN ('USD', 'EUR') ORDER BY balance ASC, created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM account_balances WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM account_balances WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, timestamp FROM transaction_histories WHERE transaction_type = 'withdrawal';
SELECT balance, user_id FROM account_balances ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, amount, timestamp FROM transaction_histories WHERE amount < 0 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM account_balances WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM account_balances WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_transactions FROM transaction_histories GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM transaction_histories WHERE amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM transaction_histories GROUP BY user_id HAVING transaction_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM account_balances;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM account_balances ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM account_balances WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM account_balances LIMIT 5 OFFSET 2;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM account_balances WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM account_balances WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM account_balances ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM account_balances GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT u.username, t.amount FROM users u JOIN transaction_histories t ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE t.amount > 100;
SELECT u.username, t.timestamp FROM users u JOIN transaction_histories t ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE t.type = 'Deposit' ORDER BY t.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT username, balance FROM user_accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT username, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE username LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE balance < 5000 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_transactions > 5000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE TIMESTAMP BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username, balance FROM users ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, type, amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE type = 'credit';
SELECT * FROM trade_history WHERE price BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND balance <= 500 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, u.username, t.amount, t.timestamp FROM transactions t JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.username = 'John' AND t.amount > 100 ORDER BY t.timestamp ASC;
SELECT c.name, cr.rate FROM currencies c JOIN currency_rates cr ON c.currency_id = cr.from_currency ORDER BY cr.rate DESC;

SELECT th.trade_id, u.username, c.name, th.amount * th.price AS total FROM trade_history th JOIN users u ON th.user_id = u.user_id JOIN currencies c ON th.currency_id = c.currency_id WHERE th.amount >= 100 ORDER BY total DESC;
